abstract: Cornell University alumni and students strongly object to board of trustee's decision to fold School of Hotel Administration into new College of Business; school, world's oldest undergraduate program devoted to hospitality industry, is considered best of its kind in United States.

headline.print_headline: Icy Reception to Merger of Cornell’s Hotel School
headline.main: Cornell’s Plan to Merge Hotel School Gets an Icy Reception

keywords.value: Cornell University School of Hotel Administration
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: Alumni and students reacted with annoyance after a vote to fold the world’s oldest undergraduate program devoted to the hospitality industry into a new business college.
lead_paragraph: Alumni and students reacted with annoyance after a vote to fold the world’s oldest undergraduate program devoted to the hospitality industry into a new business college.
